name: Lexifone
tag_list: translate, voice-translation, communicate, speak, phone, mobile, travel, enterprise, call-center
overview: Lexifone provides two-way smart voice translation, accessible from any phone - mobile or landline. Lexifone is designed as an enterprise translation solution that can also be used by individuals anywhere the need for translation should arise, for example in travel circumstances: at the hotel, a restaurant, asking for directions, shopping, at a pharmacy, doctor and more. Lexifone simplifies cross language communication â€“ utilizing any telephone, the users can hold a conversation, each in their own language, with Lexifone translating for them. Lexifone works in face to face situations where the speakers use a telephone with a speaker or pass the phone back and forth to listen to Lexifone’s translation. Lexifone also works as a third party on an over the line telephone call for example, in Call Centers or anywhere where service is given over the phone, like calling room service in a hotel.
